Control Name: MP-6 (8) REMOTE PURGING / WIPING OF INFORMATION
Control Statement: The organization provides the capability to purge/wipe information from [Assignment: organization-defined information systems, system components, or devices] either remotely or under the following conditions: [Assignment: organization-defined conditions].
